# designjobs â€” Healthcare

> Healthcare UX jobs, curated by the community. Open source and free forever.

health.designjobs.cv is the healthcare vertical of designjobs, a job board platform for design roles. This vertical focuses exclusively on UX, product design, and design research roles at healthcare and health-tech companies. Jobs are sourced from company career pages and verified for accuracy.

## Pages

- /: Homepage with featured jobs and value proposition
- /jobs: All job listings with search, location filter, and level/type filters
- /submit: Submit a new job listing for review
- /report: Report broken links or issues
- /rss.xml: RSS feed of all job listings

## Data

- Jobs are stored in JSON format and updated 3x/week (Mon, Wed, Fri)
- Each job includes: title, company, level, location, location type, tags, direct application URL, and posted date
- All job URLs are verified via automated browser validation before publishing

## Other Verticals

designjobs.cv will expand to cover additional design job verticals including AI and trade-based UX roles.

## Open Source

Source code: https://github.com/cmonies/healthcare-jobs
Built with Astro, Tailwind CSS, deployed on Vercel.
Created by carmen.cv for the design community.
